imgix Customer Dashboard Admin & Analytics

imgix is largely an invisible product. The pain points lie mostly with product education and analytics. The imgix Dashboard is a customer facing tool that provides users with the ability to modify their account settings, set up their image sources, security settings, and view their usage statistics.
